gloss: alert carnivorous mammal with pointed muzzle and ears and a bushy tail; most are predators that do not hunt in packs / an acute communicable infection of the respiratory tract and mouth marked by ulceration of the mucous membrane / any infection of the respiratory tract / infection of the upper respiratory tract
social insect living in organized colonies; characteristically the males and fertile queen have wings during breeding season; wingless sterile females are the workers

crustaceans characteristically having five pairs of locomotor appendages each joined to a segment of the thorax / leaping insect; male makes chirping noises by rubbing the forewings together / slender insect with delicate membranous wings having an aquatic larval stage and terrestrial adult stage usually lasting less than two days
